replies.body: This was a serious suggestion though XD

What if the Ward was a mini teemo on a mushroom and everytime you see one revealed, the mini teemo would demonically laugh at you and stealth away when you killed it. I would buy just for the chance to kill teemo more than i should already feel the need to (which is always).
ohgod. I would actually start buying a sightstone and acting like a real support. heck, i'd buy a sightstone on every champ xDDDDDDD

I still can't believe there isn't a Teemo mushroom ward skin after five years.  Come on guys! 

Do it for the Lord and Savior of League: {{champion:17}}

Kumungo Jungle Shaco
